document.full_text: u.s. stocks ended a three-day losing streak on wednesday as recent underperformers led a thinly traded rally that wasn't seen as strong enough to overcome worries about waning global demand.
document.title: rebound in underperformers ends wall street losing streak
lines_and_colors: u.s. stocks ended a three-day losing streak on wednesday as recent underperformers led a thinly traded rally that wasn't seen as strong enough to overcome worries about waning global demand.
